name: SquareSmasher
description:
This is a simple reflex game.

In this game, you have to aim the arrow from the middle and shot squares to the correct colors.

If you don't match a color you will lose health.

Every matched color game constantly speeds up but you also gain many bonuses to your score, the further you play.

Controls are very simple: WASD or arrows.

The game contains a simple tutorial that will explain everything in detail.

This project is in an early stage, if it will show interest in players then I will further develop it.

I'm already planning to add features like switching colors from the basic 4 in mid-game, moving platforms, different modes, and maybe upgrades.

Please give me some feedback from this game in the comments below.

Have fun!
